title-group.article-title: Alarming Antibiotic Resistance in Pediatric Oncology Patients: A Three-Year Prospective Cohort Study from Oman [Corrigendum]

body.p: Al Battashi A, Al Harrassi B, Al Maskari N, Al Hashami H, Al Awaidy S. Infect Drug Resist. 2022;15:3939–3947.
The authors have advised there are errors in the in-text citations for Tables 2 and 3.

Page 3942, Microbial Etiology and Susceptibility Pattern section, first sentence, the text “Gram-negative organisms were more commonly grown (n = 42, 57%) in children receiving chemotherapeutic agents for cancer (Table 2)” should read “Gram-negative organisms were more commonly grown (n = 42, 57%) in children receiving chemotherapeutic agents for cancer (Table 3)”.
Page 3942, Microbial Etiology and Susceptibility Pattern section, second sentence, the text “Among the gram-positive organisms” should read “Among the gram-positive organisms (Table 2)”.
Page 3944, second paragraph, sixth sentence, the text “For gram-positive bacteria (Table 3)” should read “For gram-positive bacteria (Table 2)”.
The authors apologise for these errors.
